lyrics:
[00:14.91]如何不可思议的解释
[00:17.60]总找到借口补救
[00:22.01]如何不可解决的纷争
[00:24.99]总可以迁就
[00:29.64]完全不懂保留地接受
[00:33.08]贪恋抱着你在我的手
[00:36.91]只因你让我
[00:39.36]有过最快乐时候
[00:43.96]如情感早早变质
[00:46.17]简单讲一句已经足够
[00:51.16]然而今天当你要飞走
[00:54.43]解释太荒谬
[00:58.42]平平静静地从没分手
[01:02.32]不可证实这份爱算否足够
[01:06.18]还是冷静过
[01:08.37]抉择过以后再走
[01:15.64]其实若你想这里放手
[01:20.53]不要对我说以后
[01:23.79]无谓随便乱说错误引导
[01:27.24]使我有复合念头
[01:31.03]无论是你编哪个借口
[01:34.83]不会再教我接受
[01:38.27]其实是你玩够厌倦了
[01:41.59]今天要走
[01:45.78]你爱我不足够
[01:51.24]

[02:47.66]不可证实这份爱算否足够

[02:53.49]抉择过以后再走

[03:16.48]无论是你编哪个借口
[03:20.36]不会再教我接受
[03:23.63]其实是你玩够厌倦了
[03:27.03]今天要走

[03:35.05]Music-------
[04:03.45]其实若你想这里放手
[04:07.90]不要对我说以后
[04:10.93]无谓随便乱说错误引导
[04:14.22]使我有复合念头
[04:18.26]无论是你编哪个借口
[04:22.46]不会再教我接受
[04:25.48]其实是你玩够厌倦了
[04:28.80]今天要走
[04:32.94]你爱我不足够
[04:40.16]你对我的爱不足够
[04:53.12]（情牵 ---- 2008.06.02）
[04:59.97]END
[05:06.24]

[by:草莓Zedd]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Medina, Sanz
[00:14.43]Que fácil decir "te quiero" cuando estamos solos
[00:21.36]Lo difícil es hacerlo cuando escuchan todos
[00:27.40]Si tú me miras, si tú me miras
[00:34.66]Te ensenaré a decir te quiero, sin hablar
[00:41.60]Mientras tengamos un secreto que ocultar
[00:52.53]La locura de quererte como un fugitivo
[00:59.31]Me ha llevado a la distancia donde me he escondido
[01:05.44]Si tú me miras, si tú me miras
[01:12.62]Cuanto más crezca la injusticia, ya verás
[01:19.66]Que son más grandes nuestras ganas de luchar
[01:28.23]Palabras de un lenguaje nuevo que he construido
[01:33.82]Para nosotros, para el amante perseguido
[01:39.36]Que tiene que esconder su voz, no no no no
[01:45.79]Cuando decidas aprenderlo, no habrá silencio
[01:50.83]No te hará falta usar la voz para romperlo
[01:56.71]Si tú me miras me hablarás
[02:03.33]Si tú me miras me hablarás
[02:40.56]Yo me seguiré negando pase lo que pase
[02:47.25]A exponer mi corazón en este escaparate
[02:53.29]Si tú me miras, si tú miras
[03:00.73]Nos amaremos en la justa oscuridad
[03:07.53]En la trastienda que me ha visto suplicar
[03:13.83]No, no, no
[03:16.01]Palabras de un lenguaje nuevo que he construido
[03:21.37]Para nosotros, para el amante perseguido
[03:27.33]Que tiene que esconder su voz, no no no no
[03:33.43]Cuando decidas aprenderlo, no habrá silencio
[03:38.78]No te hará falta usar la voz para romperlo
[03:44.49]Si tú me miras me hablarás
[03:51.07]Si tú me miras me hablarás

[by:一只黑鹳]
[ti:]
[ar:Just wait]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:05.34]Just wait
[00:07.71]Though wide he may roam
[00:10.94]Always
[00:13.57]A hero comes home
[00:20.85]He goes where no one has gone
[00:26.01]But always
[00:28.84]A hero comes home
[00:36.12]He knows of places unknown
[00:41.27]Always
[00:44.21]A hero comes home
[00:51.13]He goes where no one has gone
[00:56.31]But always
[00:59.10]A hero comes home

[00:24.99]Out of the mist of history
[00:28.68]He'll come again
[00:34.05]Sailing on ships across the sea
[00:38.24]To a wounded Nation
[00:43.43]Signs of a savoir
[00:45.74]Like fire on the water
[00:48.37]It's what we prayed for
[00:50.68]One of our own
[00:53.12]Just wait
[00:54.99]Though while he may roam
[00:57.74]Always
[00:59.81]A hero comes home
[01:02.43]He goes where no one has gone
[01:06.74]But always
[01:09.24]A hero comes home
[01:11.81]Deep in the heart of darkness sparks
[01:15.93]A dream of lies
[01:20.99]Surrounded by hopelessness
[01:24.81]He finds the will to fight
[01:31.13]Theres no surrender
[01:33.50]Always remember
[01:35.75]It doesn't end here
[01:38.19]We're not alone
[01:40.63]Just wait
[01:42.69]Though while he may roam
[01:45.31]Always
[01:47.50]A hero comes home
[01:50.00]He goes where no one has gone
[01:54.44]But always
[01:56.75]A hero comes home
[02:01.69]And he will come back on the crimson tide
[02:10.50]And even though we know the bridge has burned
[02:15.82]He will return
[02:18.00]He will return
[02:20.75]Just wait
[02:22.82]Though while he may roam
[02:25.25]Always
[02:27.50]A hero comes home
[02:30.00]He knows of places unknown
[02:34.44]Always
[02:36.82]A hero comes home
[02:41.01]Someday they'll carve in stone
[02:46.26]"The hero comes home"
[02:48.82]He goes and comes back alone
[02:53.25]But always
[02:55.51]A hero comes home
[02:58.26]Just wait
[03:00.32]Though while he may roam
[03:02.94]Always
[03:05.07]A hero comes home

作曲 : 二泉映月
 听琴声悠悠
 是何人在黄昏后
 身背着琵琶沿街走
 背着琵琶沿街走
 阵阵秋风
 吹动着他的青衫袖
 淡淡的月光
 石板路上人影瘦
 步履遥遥出巷口
 宛转又上小桥头
 四野寂静
 灯火微茫映画楼
 操琴的人
 似问知音何处有
 一声低吟一回首
 只见月照芦狄洲
 只见月照芦狄洲
 琴音绕丛林
 琴心在颤抖
 声声犹如松风吼
 又似泉水匆匆流
 又似泉水匆匆流
 憔悴琴魂作漫游
 平生事啊难回首
 岁月消逝人烟留
 年少青丝
 转瞬已然变白头
 苦伶仃举目无亲友
 风雨泥泞怎忍受
 荣辱沉浮无怨尤
 荣辱沉浮无怨尤
 惟有这琴弦解离愁
 晨昏常相伴
 苦乐总相守
 酒醒人散余韵悠
 酒醒人散余韵悠
 莫说壮志难踌
 胸中歌千首
 都为家乡山水留
 天地悠悠
 唯情最长久
 共祝愿
 五洲四海烽烟收
 家家笙歌奏
 年年岁岁乐无忧
 年年岁岁乐无忧
 纵然人似黄鹤
 一抔净土惠山丘
 噢此情绵绵不休
 天涯芳草知音有
 你的琴声还伴着
 泉水流
